Sorting Defined Help

Letâ€™s sort!

First, read the directions at the top of the screen.

Drag the words or pictures from the bottom of the screen into the correct boxes.

You can move items that you have already sorted if you want to change your answer.

After you have sorted all of the items, click OK.

Click the Reset button to start over again.

To complete another round, click the right arrow button.

Click the left arrow button to go back to the last screen.

Click on the ? for help and to hear these directions again.
